description.en: Hyperchain X is the world’s first community driven token in gaming. The goal is to create a crypto gaming platform with an all-in-one application consisting of elements like: buy-in tournaments, 1 vs 1 high stake battles, league creation options for esport teams, live streams and an NFT marketplace that is unseen in this space. We see that there is a need for a dedicated gaming platform where gamers can feel at home, and we at HyperChain X are fulfilling this dream. We will also be creating our own mobile game for android/iOS with in-game NFTS. All purchases in our game and platform will be built on $HYPER tokens.
